Description: Bust of Julia Domna, draped, head, bare, right, hair waved in five horizontal ridges, large chignon at back. (obverse)
Roma, helmeted, draped to feet, seated left on round shield, holding Victory on extended right hand and vertical sceptre in left. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Bibliographic references: RE5 / Coins of the Roman Empire in the British Museum, vol.V: Pertinax to Elagabalus (333, p.87)
RIC4 / The Roman imperial coinage, vol. 4: Pertinax - Uranius Antonius (613, p.174) (type)
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Julia Domna
